message: This is my first offer, Bob. I think it's fair, given that I'm the one taking the bigger risk with the inflation.
I think we should split it closer to 60-40, considering the inflation affects me more.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I'm still concerned about the inflation, but I think this offer is fair.
Considering the inflation is hitting me harder, I think I should get the larger share. This is my counteroffer.
